meanings.definition: Decided on or officially chosen for a job or position.
meanings.sent1: The appointed leader guided the team with wisdom.
meanings.sent2: She was the appointed manager of the new project.
meanings.sent3: The appointed chef accidentally added too much salt to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The appointed captain steered the ship through the storm.
meanings.sent5: The appointed judge delivered a fair verdict.

meanings.definition: Established or arranged for a specific time or purpose.
meanings.sent1: The appointed meeting was scheduled for tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The appointed time for the event was 3:00 PM.
meanings.sent3: The appointed picnic turned into an unexpected adventure.
meanings.sent4: The appointed deadline loomed closer with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The appointed task required careful planning.
